defines.description: A dictionary object of defined `expression` strings mapped to a variable name that may be referenced throughout the style. If an expression references a defined variable, it is replaced with the result of the corresponding evaluated expression.

show.description: A `boolean expression` or `conditions` property which determines if a feature should be shown.

color.description: A `color expression` or `conditions` property which determines the color blended with the feature's intrinsic color.

meta.description: A `meta` object which determines the values of non-visual properties of the feature.
